# View dataset
```{r}

head(cars)
colnames(cars)
```





# Visualize Data
```{r}
plot(cars[,"speed"], cars[,"dist"], main="Speed vs Stopping Distance",
xlab="Speed", ylab="Stopping Distance")

```









# Model Creation
-17.579 + 3.932*speed  

```{r}
model <- lm(dist~speed, data = cars)
model
```

# Model Evaluation
```{r}
summary(model)

```







# Residual Analysis

```{r}
plot(model)

```
